entry.title: Rich's - Chocolate Iced Eclairs Bavarian Cream Filling - 4x12pcs/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rich's
Type: FOOD
Price: 66.99

Rich's - Chocolate Eclairs - 4 x 12 pcs / Case

Ready To Serve New York Style Eclair Chocolate Iced Beverarian Cream Filling

GLUCOSE-FRUCTOSE, HYDROGENATED PALM KERNEL OIL, LIQUID WHOLE EGG, ICING SUGAR, ENRICHED UNBLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR, WATER, SUGAR, INVERT SUGAR, COCOA, SODIUM CASEINATE (A MILK DERIVATIVE), PALM OIL, GLUCOSE SYRUP, AMMONIUM CARBONATE, SALT, PRESERVATIVE (SODIUM PROPIONATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE), DEXTROSE, POLYSORBATE 60, MODIFIED CELLULOSE, SOYA LECITHIN, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOUR, AGAR-AGAR, POLYGLYCEROL ESTERS OF FATTY ACIDS, SOYA PROTEIN CONCENTRATE, XANTHAN GUM, CAROB BEAN GUM, COLOURS.

CONTAINS: WHEAT, MILK, EGG, SOYA

entry.title: La Fruitiere - Frozen Pink Grapefruit Puree - 1 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: La Fruitiere
Type: BAKING
Price: 17.49

Made with real Fruits , this puree has a low viscosity and bitterness,Â and is high in aromatic fragrance, acidity, and sweetness, with an all-around full-bodied taste. This puree is made without preservatives and does not contain artificial colors or flavors. In fact, this puree was created to maintain its original characteristics to let its most natural taste, color, and texture shine in your menu items, any time of the year.

Packaged in a state-of-the-art tray,Â optimal efficiency and economical practice is prioritized to get the most out of this top-quality puree. The tray is designed to take up the least amount of space in your refrigerator or freezer, as well as being able to stack on top of one another for perfect organization.

The puree itself is easy to unmold and portion, and can also be defrosted for 24 hours in the refrigerator, or thawed in a baine Marie or microwave for easy pouring. Plus, the tray is designed with three tapered edges to have full control over pouring for exact measuring and less messes. When you're done using the puree, the lid is designed with a snap-on seal to let you know that it is properly closed.

The flavor characteristics of this puree are as versatile as it is in application. With this puree, crafting anything from cocktails to desserts is simple. This puree can be used in fruit glazes, simple syrups, sabayon, meringues, pastry creams, cremeux, and even as a macaroon filling.Â 

This puree can be used to make parfaits, yogurts, sorbets, ice creams, and even cocktails with gin and Sherry.Â It also pair very well with stone fruits, nectarines, rhubarb, various subtle nuts such as almonds and hazelnuts, or warm cinnamon, zingy ginger, bright mint, and floral thyme.

The natural FRUIT PUREES made from selected fruits and cane sugar are ready-to-use and particularly suitable as an ingredient in confectioneries, for making ice cream, for making confectionery and chocolate, for cooking and for cocktail bars.Â 

Made by extracting and filtering a juice, from selected varieties.

La Fruitiere - Pink Grapefruit Puree - 1 Kg

The natural FRUIT PUREES made from selected fruits and cane sugar are ready-to-use and particularly suitable as an ingredient in confectioneries, for making ice cream, for making confectionery and chocolate, for cooking and for cocktail bars.Â 

La Fruitiere - Lime Puree - 1 Kg

entry.title: La Fruitiere - Frozen Lemon Puree - 1 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: La Fruitiere
Type: BAKING
Price: 13.49

Made with real Fruits , this puree has a low viscosity and bitterness,Â and is high in aromatic fragrance, acidity, and sweetness, with an all-around full-bodied taste. This puree is made without preservatives and does not contain artificial colors or flavors. In fact, this puree was created to maintain its original characteristics to let its most natural taste, color, and texture shine in your menu items, any time of the year.


Packaged in a state-of-the-art tray,Â optimal efficiency and economical practice is prioritized to get the most out of this top-quality puree. The tray is designed to take up the least amount of space in your refrigerator or freezer, as well as being able to stack on top of one another for perfect organization.

The puree itself is easy to unmold and portion, and can also be defrosted for 24 hours in the refrigerator, or thawed in a baine Marie or microwave for easy pouring. Plus, the tray is designed with three tapered edges to have full control over pouring for exact measuring and less messes. When you're done using the puree, the lid is designed with a snap-on seal to let you know that it is properly closed.

The flavor characteristics of this puree are as versatile as it is in application. With this puree, crafting anything from cocktails to desserts is simple. This puree can be used in fruit glazes, simple syrups, sabayon, meringues, pastry creams, cremeux, and even as a macaroon filling.Â 

This puree can be used to make parfaits, yogurts, sorbets, ice creams, and even cocktails with gin and Sherry.Â It also pair very well with stone fruits, nectarines, rhubarb, various subtle nuts such as almonds and hazelnuts, or warm cinnamon, zingy ginger, bright mint, and floral thyme.

The natural FRUIT PUREES made from selected fruits and cane sugar are ready-to-use and particularly suitable as an ingredient in confectioneries, for making ice cream, for making confectionery and chocolate, for cooking and for cocktail bars.Â

entry.title: Trans Alpine - Whole Cherries - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Trans Alpine
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 56.99

Trans Alpine - Whole Cherries - 4 L

Put the cherry on top of your signature desserts with these maraschino cherries.

Featuring a vibrant red color, these maraschino cherries are sure to brighten up your menu items and bring something new to the table. These cherries are to add a more natural-looking decoration to your offerings. The bulk gallon jar ensures that there's plenty for you to use to match the color scheme of your next holiday display or special event.

Delicious Flavor

These cherries boast a crisp, sweet flavor and soft texture, making them a must-have topping for your restaurant, bar, ice cream shop, or bakery.

Resealable Container

To ensure optimum freshness, these cherries are picked at the peak of ripeness and packed in a hermetically sealed gallon container.

Versatile Ingredient

With their ruby red coloring and plump, juicy flesh, cherries are an excellent ingredient in a variety of desserts and cocktails. They're famous in pineapple upside down cakes, topping off any sundae, or garnishing a cocktail. With their juice, craft Shirley Temples or other cherry juice-based beverages. Plus, the juice can act as a natural food coloring dye, giving a beautiful pink hue to cake batters, housemade ice cream, and even gourmet marshmallows.

entry.title: Lynch - Caramel Topping - 2 x 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 46.99

Lynch - Caramel Topping - 2 x 4 L

We offer an array of traditional topping favourites made with quality ingredients such as natural caramelized sugars, butter, cocoa and toffee flavours.Â Choose from Caramel, Chocolate, Toffee, Fudge and Fruit varieties. Our highly versatile Ice Cream Toppings are ideal for putting the finishing touch on ice cream and desserts, as well as for plate decorating and adding to specialty coffee. Use them in a variety of recipes to increase your profit picture.

PRODUCT INFORMATION

A rich traditional favourite made with caramelized sugar, butter, and caramel flavours.

USE IDEAS

Spoon over ice cream, frozen yogurt and other frozen desserts. Great for making exceptional desserts - brownie or cake creations, ice cream sundaes and banana splits.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

Ready to use.

INGREDIENTS

Corn syrup, sugar, water, brown sugar, modified milk ingredient, canola oil modified palm oil & palm kernel oils, sweetened condensed milk (contains lactose), salt, artificial & natural flavour, disodium phosphate, caramel, pectin, mono & diglycerides (soy), sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate, xanthan gum, colour.
